data.name: My Sugar Mommy is a Futanari
data.detailed_description:
Rent is due, and your dead-end job doesn't pay enough to make ends meet.
Out of sheer desperation you take to the internet and come across a Sugar Mommy website.

Before long it looks like your luck is changing as a sexy cougar in you local area is interested in setting up an exclusive arrangement with you--and she's loaded!
She wants to meet you at her penthouse apartment for proceedings--"Dress casually".

Read through some pretty raunchy(erotic) dialogue, accompanied by spicy nude depictions.

Gameplay

Kinetic Visual Novel

H-Scenes
~5K words

Immerse yourself in the story by typing in your own name, then proceeding to read through a raunchy story from the first-person perspective.

data.short_description: In desperate need for extra cash, you take to the internet and come across a Sugar Mommy website.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
*All characters in this game are over the age of 21 years old.

- Futanari
- Exploitation
- Dirty language
- Mature sex (Sugar Mommy)
